org.bladerunnerjs.plugin.base

Class AbstractPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bladerunnerjs.plugin.base.AbstractPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Plugin
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractAssetLocationPlugin, AbstractAssetPlugin, AbstractCommandPlugin, AbstractContentPlugin, AbstractMinifierPlugin, AbstractModelObserverPlugin, AbstractRequirePlugin, AbstractTagHandlerPlugin

    public abstract class AbstractPlugin
extends java.lang.Object
implements Plugin
    The AbstractPlugin class is used to provide common implementations of the plug-in methods needed to overcome the issues caused by the use of virtual proxy wrappers (see Plugin for more details). Since this class is abstract, developers will need to extend one of this classes sub-classes to make use of this functionality.

      java.lang.Class<?> getPluginClass()
      An alternative to Java's Object.getClass() method that is needed because BladeRunnerJS wraps plug-ins within virtual proxy wrappers, causing the native Object.getClass() method to become ineffective.
      boolean instanceOf(java.lang.Class<? extends Plugin> pluginCLass)
      An alternative to Java's instanceof operator that is needed because BladeRunnerJS wraps plug-ins within virtual proxy wrappers, causing the native instanceof operator to become ineffective.

        public void close()

      • instanceOf

        public boolean instanceOf(java.lang.Class<? extends Plugin> pluginCLass)
        Description copied from interface: Plugin
        An alternative to Java's instanceof operator that is needed because BladeRunnerJS wraps plug-ins within virtual proxy wrappers, causing the native instanceof operator to become ineffective.

        Plug-ins are not expected to implement this method themselves, and should instead extend one of the AbstractPlugin sub-classes (e.g. AbstractCommandPlugin).

        Specified by:
        instanceOf in interface Plugin
        Parameters:
        pluginCLass - The class which this object may, or may not be, an instance of.
        Returns:
        true, if this object is an instance of the given class, and false otherwise.

      • getPluginClass

        public java.lang.Class<?> getPluginClass()
        Description copied from interface: Plugin
        An alternative to Java's Object.getClass() method that is needed because BladeRunnerJS wraps plug-ins within virtual proxy wrappers, causing the native Object.getClass() method to become ineffective.

        Plug-ins are not expected to implement this method themselves, and should instead extend one of the AbstractPlugin sub-classes (e.g. AbstractCommandPlugin).

        Specified by:
        getPluginClass in interface Plugin
        Returns:
        A reference to the class of the underlying plug-in.
